summary: From the dark daedric realms hails a bow so powerful, so evil that (almost) nothing can withstand its awesome and fear some power
descriptionHtml:
Hi, this is the black bow mod which basically adds a bow which can kill dragons in one hit (Dependant of archery level) and destroy and decimate monsters such as frostbite spiders and wolves (Like you will be using this for them).
[font=Courier New][size=2]
[/size][/font]Location:
[font=Courier New][size=2]
[/size][/font]Due to its power, you MUST cheat it in using "Black" in the console, then use the player.additem with the weapon's code with a following space and a one to obtain the bow
[font=Courier New][size=2]
[/size][/font]Dragons:
When you kill a dragon with this bow, it will fly around a bit due to the dragon's coding not being able to cope with such a large amount of damage from one shot, so be patient and wait for the dragon
[font=Courier New][size=2]
[/size][/font]Standard enemy's ( People, drauger etc) These enemy's will hit the deck with an arrow, or regular bow-bash, yet again, it depends on your archery skill, and over all level, ( I obtained the damage to 2000+ in case you was wondering)
[font=Courier New][size=2]
[/size][/font]Arrows:
Well, any old shitty arrow will do, including the rusty arrows
